fields.name: Fatal Acceleration (C1)
fields.value:
Upon scoring a CRIT hit, increases ATK SPD of Xinyan's Normal and Charged Attacks by 12% for 5s.
Can only occur once every 5s.

fields.name: Impromptu Opening (C2)
fields.value: Riff Revolution Physical DMG has its Crit rate increased by 100%, and will form a shield at Shield Level 3: Rave when cast.

fields.name: Double Stop (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Sweeping Fervor by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Wildfire Rhythm (C4)
fields.value: Sweeping Fervor's swing DMG decrease opponents Physical RES by 15% for 12s.

fields.name: Screaming for Encore (C5)
fields.value: Increases the Level of Riff Revolution by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Rocking in Flaming (C6)
fields.value: Decrease the stamina consumption of Xinyan Charged Attacks by 30%. Additionally, Xinyan Charged Attack gain an ATK bonus equal to 50% of her DEF.
